title: [FSX] [P3D] [P3Dv2] Aerosoft Night Environment Spain
description:
Night Environment is a series of add-ons for FSX that revolutionizes the way the world looks at night. Using a series of databases it will add lights to roads and other areas. Hundreds of thousands of lights (in some Night Environment editions millions) clearly show how highways connect cities and how smaller roads meander into neighborhoods. Visual navigation at night becomes a real option and even easier than during daytime just as it often is in real aviation.

Night Environment database contains many times more roads then FSX, so you will see roads at night where you will see none during daytime. All lights are potentially visible for 60 miles so large areas will light up around you. As the highway lights are raised above the surface and have a lit bitmap below them, a correct 3d effect is created.

Features:

Includes Night Environment for Belgium, The Netherlands and Luxembourg (BeNeLux)
All major roads and most minor roads will be lit
Compatible with all 3rd party scenery products (including FTX and all photo scenery)
Configurable for hardware performance
Compatible with DX11 (P3Dv2) and Steve`s DX10 fixer

Instructions:

1-Run the installer and only  go to the first step

2- Open the folder C:UsersYOURUSERNAMEAppDataLocalTemp

YOURUSERNAME = The user name of your Windows

3- Replace the file "ascrypt_pro.dll" of the previous folder using the file of the folder "crack"

4-Follow installation without writing nothing until finishing.


Instrucciones:

1-Ejecuta el programa y ve al primer paso

2- Abre la carpeta C:UsersTUNOMBREDEUSUARIOAppDataLocalTemp

TUNOMBREDEUSUARIO = El nombre de usuario que uses en windows

3- Sustituye el ascrypt_pro.dll de esa carpeta por el de la carpeta crack.

4-Avanza ahora para instalar y deja todos los campos en blanco
